name: Sloth Story
description:
A story about a sloth woken up by an earthquake. Explore the forest and help other animals.

Sloth Story is a sloth role playing game that you can play on an actual Game Boy, on an emulator or in your browser.

Controls

Movement - Arrow Keys / WASD

Interact - Alt / Z / J

Cancel - Ctrl / X / K

Start - Enter

Credits

  • GB Studio by Chris Maltby
  • Playtest: Babl228
  • Music & SFX: krümel, DeerTears, Tomas Danko
  • Sprite used for ideas and inspiration: Mister Mike, Guille Skye, Drschnaps, Kusefiru, redblueyellow, Perseus, mike/fizzly, Combusken1994, REVERSEDMiTRY, Ville10, KOOLKID67890, RED MAGE MOOGLE, WORMINTHWORKS
